subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|う}}

Stem of classical adjective {{m|ja|憂し|tr=ushi}},<ref>{{R:Daijisen}}</ref><ref>{{R:Daijirin}}</ref> modern {{m|ja|憂い|tr=ui||[[gloomy]], [[sad]]}}.
